Introduction

USPEER is an upcoming seven-member girl group under WM Entertainment.

First announced on July 19, 2023 by WM Entertainment's parent company RBW, USPEER was reported to debut in mid 2024 with six to seven members. However, no news regarding the group was shared and, as 2024 passed, the whereabouts of the group remained unknown.

On March 24, 2025, the agency launched SNS accounts and posted a logo motion revealing their name to be "USPEER". The same day, an article was posted, confirming the group's debut for the first half of 2025.

Their name, "USPEER", is a combination of "US", meaning "we", and "SPEER", meaning "question" or "ask", and can be explained as "we'll understand the nature of the world where we'll be together and create a better future".

On March 31, 2025, the seven members names were revealed in a Twitter post teasing their debut reality show, called "RUN UP!". Three days later, on April 3, 2025, the seven members were properly introduced to be Sian, Seoyu, Daon, Roa, Chaena, Soee, and Yeowon, in the first episode of the show.
